name: Aave Flashloan Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) simultaneously to earn stkAAVE. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Flashloans are used to obtain additional {{token}} from [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) to boost the APY.

en.name: Aave Flashloan Folding
en.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) simultaneously to earn stkAAVE. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Flashloans are used to obtain additional {{token}} from [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) to boost the APY.

fr.name: Aave Flashloan Folding
fr.description: Fournit et emprunte simultanément du {{token}} sur [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) pour gagner du stkAAVE. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui est ensuite redéposé dans la stratégie. Les flashloans sont utilisés pour obtenir des {{token}} supplémentaires sur [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) afin d'augmenter l'APY.

es.name: Aave Flashloan Folding
es.description: Suministra y pide prestado {{token}} en [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) simultáneamente para ganar stkAAVE. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se depositan nuevamente en la estrategia. Los préstamos flash se utilizan para obtener {{token}} adicionales de [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) para aumentar el APY.

tr.name: Aave Flashloan Folding
tr.description: stkAAVE kazanmak için aynı anda [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets)'de hem {{token}} sağlar hem ödünç alır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır. Flashloan'lar, APY'yi artırmak için [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview)'dan ek {{token}} elde etmek için kullanılır.

zh.name: Aave Flashloan Folding
zh.description: 同时在 [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) 存入和借出 {{token}} 赚取 stkAAVE 奖励。收获奖励卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。在 [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) 上使用闪电贷借出更多的 {{token}} 提升 APY。
